declarations.name: TRPCRouter
declarations.description: Type representing the root tRPC router for the application. Used for type-safe access to all RPC procedures and endpoints.

declarations.name: TRPCRouterInputs
declarations.description: Type helper that infers the input types for all procedures in the TRPCRouter. Useful for type-safe input construction and validation.

declarations.name: TRPCRouterOutputs
declarations.description: Type helper that infers the output types for all procedures in the TRPCRouter. Useful for type-safe result handling and validation.

declarations.name: trpcRouter
declarations.description: The root tRPC router instance for the application, aggregating all RPC procedures and routers.
